comment: Abe chutiye kisi nam chamkane se kisi jaan bachti hai to chutiye nam chamakna sahi gandu modi ke dalal
amr:
# ::snt Abe chutiye kisi nam chamkane se kisi jaan bachti hai to chutiye nam chamakna sahi gandu modi ke dalal
(a / and
      :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 (c / chuti))
      :op2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 (c2 / country-region
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Chuti_1")))
      :op3 (b3 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 c2
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Chamkane"))
      :op4 (b4 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 (k / kisi
                  :mod (j / jaan)))
      :op5 (b5 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 (k2 / kisi
                  :mod j))
      :op6 (b6 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 (c3 / chuti))
      :op7 (b7 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 (c4 / chamakna))
      :op8 (b8 / be-located-at-91
            :ARG2 (s / sahi
                  :mod (g / gandu)))
      :op9 (m / modi
            :mod (k3 / ke-dalal)))

comment: Isko itni hi chull hai toh PM se bole Vaccine certificate se apni photo hata le
amr:
# ::snt Isko itni hi chull hai toh PM se bole Vaccine certificate se apni photo hata le
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / have-polarity-91
                  :ARG1 (ii / itni)
                  :ARG2 -
                  :ARG1 (h2 / hi)
                  :op2-of a)
            :ARG1 ii
            :ARG2 -
            :ARG3 (t / too))
      :snt2 (h3 / have-org-role-91
            :ARG0 (ii2 / itni)
            :ARG2 (m2 / minister
                  :mod (p / prime)))
      :snt3 (c / certificate
            :mod (v / vaccine)
            :mod (b / bole))
      :snt4 (p2 / photograph-01
            :mod (a2 / apni))
      :snt5 (h4 / hata
            :mode expressive))
